Self.Wiki: Determines GPARAM timezone parameters during a cutscene.

disableParam_NT.Wiki: Exclude from the NT version or mark the ones to be excluded.

disableParam_Product.Wiki: Exclude from the product version or mark the items to be excluded.

DstTimezone_Morning.Wiki: Morning (Refer to the cutscene time conversion setting sheet for the conversion time)

DstTimezone_Noon.Wiki: Day A (Refer to the cutscene time conversion setting sheet for the conversion time)

DstTimezone_AfterNoon.Wiki: Noon-B (Refer to the cutscene time conversion setting sheet for the conversion time)

DstTimezone_Evening.Wiki: Evening (Refer to the cutscene time conversion setting sheet for the conversion time)

DstTimezone_Night.Wiki: Night (Refer to the cutscene time conversion setting sheet for the conversion time)

DstTimezone_DeepNightA.Wiki: Midnight A (Refer to the cutscene time conversion setting sheet for the conversion time)

DstTimezone_DeepNightB.Wiki: Midnight B (Refer to the cutscene time conversion setting sheet for the conversion time)
